manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Small dust pan and Brush Set, Why choose us we’re very confident about the premium quality and practicality of our Small dust pan and Brush Set. Our Mini Dustpan and Brush Set have been specially treated and helps you get smallest particles into pan, As for the dustpan, it has a wide lip that allows for maximum surface contact and leave no debris behind. The small dust pan and brush set snaps into the dust pan, so that you can store them together and keep them within easy reach. Both the dust pan and the cleaning brush have hanging holes that help you save space. The dustpan and brush set are small and made with high quality PET fibers,Great for cleaning up small messes, also bonus as mini decorations hanging on the desktop.

Product Features Smooth & Sturdy The ergonomic nonslip handles provide you with the most secure grip and optimal comfort and control.The bristles of the brush are firm, smooth, scratch-free, compact construction for easy and efficient sweeping. Leave no gaps The small broom and dustpan set it has a wide lip that allows for maximum surface contact and leave no debris behind. Easy to clean without any stains,Long-term and repeated use. Easy to Store The dustpan and brush set snaps into dustpan design is perfect for centralized storage, will not take up space. Brush and dustpan are designed with hanging hole for easy storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE this mini dustpan! Feels great in hand. Cleans up easily.
reviews.reviewText: I bought two, which is a better deal. The brush handle fits and feels great in your hand, and sweeps up debris easily with sturdy bristles that don't deteriorate. The narrowness of the brush can sweep narrow places. The lip on the pan helps hold debris into place so it doesn't slide back to where it originated. The wider pan helps hold more debris. The brush clicks securely onto the pan for storage, and can be pulled apart easily when ready to use.I bought this to sweep up cat liter around my litterbox, and it works like a charm. It also easily sweeps up the litter that has turned to powder. (Powdered litter is less functional than normal litter, so I like to sweep it away to keep the litter fresh. After I scoop up the used litter, I then use this brush and dustpan to remove the powdered litter.)This mini dustpan is a better, sturdier quality than the cheaper blue mini dustpan I had previously purchased from a "dollar" store, but which is no longer available at that store. I wanted a second dustpan for my second litterbox, and found that blue one at Amazon, but the reviews for it weren't as good. So I found and purchased this one. Best choice I made! I'm glad I opted for the "2 pieces" deal. I now have one located near each litterbox, and no longer use the old blue dustpan. I now have fun brushing up the excess around and in each litterbox. I never thought that using a mini dustpan like this one would bring me so much joy! It is so much more comfortable and enjoyable to use this well made mini dustpan that feels smooth in the hand, and sweeps up debris with one swoop. A simple pleasure at an affordable, reasonable price!
